mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspCtgrySrch Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ DSP_CTGRY_NO , DSP_CTGRY_SRCH_NM , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_CTGRY_SRCH WHERE 1 = 1 AND DSP_CTGRY_NO = #{dspCtgryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteDspCtgrySrch Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM DSP_CTGRY_SRCH WHERE 1 = 1 AND DSP_CTGRY_NO = #{dspCtgryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
